channel.title: NPC placing

item.title: NPC placing
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

i tried adding drops to my npc(id 1320)

public static int randomBunny() { return Bunny[(int)(Math.random()*Bunny.length)]; }

then in npc handler

if(npcs[1320].npcType == 1320) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomBunny(), npcs[1320].absX, npcs[1320].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(1320), false); }

got an error here

NPCHandler.java:2008: class, interface, or enum expected if(npcs[1320].npcType == 1320) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2010: class, interface, or enum expected }→ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
